body_html:
PIP has no relation to the environment variable.
Based on your reply, I assume you did not set it.
You can try this before you run mnist_with_summaries.py
It will have to be run in the same terminal, right before you run TF.

export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH

It's working ! Thanks !

body:
> PIP has no relation to the environment variable.
> Based on your reply, I assume you did not set it.
> You can try this before you run `mnist_with_summaries.py`
> It will have to be run in the same terminal, right before you run TF.
> 
> ```
> export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
> ```

It's working ! Thanks !
